body.p: Having experienced what it is to have a sore throat and fearing yours may increase—I send a little treacle posset and some purging Pills also a little Nitre, hoping you may experience some relief from them if you choose to take them—a stocking taken warm from the leg and put round the throat on going to bed is said to be a good remedy.
